quote: Life is what happens when you're making other plans
author: John Lennon

quote: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow
author: Beyoncé

quote: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible
author: Frank Zappa

quote: I've had great success being a total idiot
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: Do the things you believe in, in the name of love And know that, you aren't alone,We all have doubts and fear
author: Carole King

quote: Imagination creates reality
author: Richard Wagner

quote: Never stop fighting no matter what anyone says, If it's in your gut, your soul, there's nothing, no worldly possession that should come between you and your expression
author: Kanye West

quote: Dare to wear the foolish clown face
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you
author: BB King

quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas I'm frightened of the old ones
author: John Cage

quote: Everything is scary if you look at it So you just got to live it
author: Mary J Blige

quote: Some people come into our lives, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never the same
author: Schubert

quote: Love is like nothing else on this earth, but only when it is shared with someone wonderful like you
author: Mandy Moore

quote: I can live only wholly with you or not at all
author: Beethoven

quote: Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius
author: Mozart

quote: What force is more potent than love?
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: And, in the end the love you take is equal to the love you make
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; 'like' is nice but limited
author: Duke Ellington

quote: I can do nothing but think of you what have you done to me? Can't you remove the spell you have cast over me?
author: Johannes Brahms

quote: I know of no better definition of love than the one given by Proust  Love is space and time measured by the heart
author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on
author: Billie Holiday

quote: One thing I've learned is that I'm not the owner of my talent; I'm the manager of it
author: Madonna

quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: You can't knock on opportunity's door and not be ready
author: Bruno Mars

quote: The roughest roads often lead to the top
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: You can't give up something you really believe in for financial reasons
author: Robert Plant

quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time
author: Leonard Bernstein

quote: So put your heart and soul into it and give it everything you've got, and more power to you
author: Vinnie Paul

quote: If you do something you hate and have success, you'll still hate it, if you do something you hate and fail, all the worse, if you do something you love and fail, at least you did something you loved, if you do something you love and succeed, double win
author: Moby

quote: Make mistakes, make mistakes, make mistakes Just make sure they're your mistakes
author: Fiona Apple

quote: It's like if you want something so badly go out there and grab, just keep on doing it
author: Ed Sheeran

quote: Despite everything, no one can dictate who you are to other people
author: Prince

quote: Increase your confidence in your self-worth and in your ability to contribute good things to the world
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: Embrace what makes you unique, even if it makes others uncomfortable I didn't have to become perfect because I've learned throughout my journey that perfection is the enemy of greatness
author: Janelle Monae

quote: You don't have to believe everything you think
author: Erykah Badu

quote: Where's your will to be weird?
author: Jim Morrison

quote: There's always that argument to make that you're in better company historically if people don't understand what you're doing
author: Elliott Smith

quote: Until you're ready to look foolish, you'll never have the possibility of being great
author: Cher

quote: I'm one of those regular weird people
author: Janis Joplin
